terms.title: Terms of Service
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
terms.content: Welcome to Hotel ROC Terms of Service. By using our services, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully. All bookings are subject to availability and confirmation. Payment is required upon confirmation unless otherwise stated. Cancellations are subject to our cancellation policy, available on our website. We are not responsible for lost or stolen items. Guests are expected to behave respectfully towards staff and other guests. Damage to hotel property will be charged to the guest. Check-in time is 3:00 PM, Check-out time is 11:00 AM. Pets are not allowed unless explicitly stated. Smoking is only permitted in designated areas.
privacy.content: Hotel ROC Privacy Policy. We are committed to protecting your privacy. We collect personal information such as name, contact details, and payment information solely for booking and service purposes. We do not share your personal data with third parties except as required by law or for essential service provision (e.g., payment processing). We use appropriate security measures to protect your data. You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information by contacting us. We may use your contact information to send you promotional offers, but you can opt-out at any time. Our website may use cookies to enhance user experience.
registration.create_account_info: Create an account to easily manage your bookings and receive our â¬5 ROC Friend discount on future stays after your first booking!

admin.bookings.filter_info_explanation:
Here's how the date filters are applied:

- **Check-in from:** Shows bookings with a check-in date EXACTLY matching this date.
- **Check-in to:** If set, further filters the results to show only bookings (already filtered by 'Check-in from') where the check-out date is ON or BEFORE this date.

*Example:* To see all bookings checking in on April 30th and checking out on or before May 8th, set 'Check-in from' to April 30th and 'Check-in to' to May 8th.
